abstract: The latest edition of the Firefox browser is being released today with a call to set a world record for software downloads. Beyond the hype and a few new features, the new version is the beginning of an evolution in the standards behind Web pages that will enable much more sophisticated applications.
snippet: The latest edition of the Firefox browser is being released today with a call to set a world record for software downloads. Beyond the hype and a few new features, the new version is the beginning of an evolution in the standards behind Web pages ...
lead_paragraph: UPDATE | 6/18 2:04 PM After a bumpy start, Mozilla has well exceeded its goal, with more than 8 million copies downloaded in the first 24 hours.

headline.main: Stunts Today for Firefox. Sophisticated Programs Tomorrow
